The claim originated from a tweet by: Ten_GOP, a Twitter account that is not affiliated with the Tennessee Republican Party.
The image of Hillary Clinton with an: undercover nurse" was connected to an image of her personal physician, Dr. Lisa Bardack, leading to speculation.
The woman in the photo was identified as: a former Clinton staffer who was working as a volunteer advance person for Clinton at the 9/11 event.
Clinton campaign spokesman Brian Fallon: not an "undercover nurse" or Clinton's personal doctor.
